US_text: As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to see different food item types displayed in different colors—RGB = #FF0000 for meats, #A52AFA for grains, and #808000 for vegetables and fruits, so that I can quickly identify my food items by food type.
As a reader, I want to bookmark pages, so that I can quickly find relevant content in the future.
As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save my list, so that later I can save a copy, print, or email the list for other uses.
As a blogger who codes, I want the blogging system to integrate with GitHub, so that readers can see my GitHub activity in my profile.
As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save, copy, print, and email my list, so that I can edit it again, check a received shipment against a printed list, and send the list to a restaurant.
As a tester, I want to have detailed test plans so that when the system is completed, I can test the system.
As a business user, I want a report of item profitability, so that I can identify and highlight profitable items and consider what to do about underperforming items.
As the system, I want to store customer account info and their order lists in the database.
As a customer ordering food, I want to locate previous food order lists, so that I can see all the lists that I have.
As a Manny’s food service customer, I want my custom item code to stand out, so that I can find it on the screen more quickly.
As a blogger who codes, I want my GitHub activity to be displayed in my profile, so that readers can see that I'm a prolific coder and read my posts.
As a Manny’s food service customer, I want to save my list, so that I can reorder from the list to create more accurate food orders.
As a customer ordering food, I want to see my saved food order lists, so that I can reuse the list for future orders, making ordering faster and more accurate.
As a user, I want a dropdown with autocomplete and API-based search, So that I can find products quickly.
As a user, I want a new reporting system, so that I can see all company data.
As a developer, I want to finalize the database table changes and additions for the release, so that we don’t have to make changes to the model later.
As a business user, I would like a report of item profitability, so that I can identify and highlight profitable items and address underperforming items.
As a Google Keep user, I want to have my shopping lists in black and my daily notes in blue, So that they are easily differentiable.
As a customer, I want to withdraw cash from an ATM, So that I don't have to wait in line at the bank.
As a project manager, I want to be able to share projects to other users, so that we can work collaboratively.
